name: Eduard Eiben
content: Eduard Eiben - Royal Holloway Research Portal Eduard Eiben Dr Lecturer in Computer Science, Department of Computer ScienceCentre for Intelligent Systems https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2628-3435 Phone+44 1784 276819EmailEduard.Eibenrhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Personal profileI am currently a Lecturer in Computer Science at Royal Holloway, University of London.Before joining Royal Holloway, between October 2017 and October 2019, I was a Postdoctoral researcher in the Algorithms group at the Department of Informatics, University of Bergen, Norway, hosted by Daniel Lokshtanov.For more up-to-date list of publications you cal also see my DBLP entry or Google Scholar.Educational background I completed my PhD in Theoretical Computer Science as a member of the Doctoral College Logical Methods in Computer Science and of the Algorithms and Complexity Group at TU Wien under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Stefan Szeider and Dr. Robert Ganian in April 2018. My dissertation thesis titled "Exploiting new types of structure for fixed-parameter tractability" can be found here.I did my master and bachelor studies in Computer Science  at Comenius University, Bratislava, Slovakia. Research interestsI am mosty interested in Parameterized Algorithms and Complexity. Especially for problems from Artificial Intelligence and Graph Theory.
